185927371.review: Puzzles are interesting. Story is decent until the twist.

185899233.review:
The Sexy Brutale is a charming game that feels like a mix of a point and click murder mystery games, an old school Resident Evil game and the movie Groundhog Day.  It takes around 10 hours to complete.  It never felt like it overstayed its welcome and it was enjoyable until the end.

You play as Lafacdio Boone, a preacher who has received an invitation to a Masked Ball along with several others from their friend the Marquis in his Mansion.  The gameplay centers around navigating different areas of the mansion during a 12 hour time loop and finding a way to prevent the other guests from being murdered by the staff of the mansion.  This is done by finding different clues, using powers you obtain from the masks and using items that you find.  You are also able to manipulate time in 4 hour intervals forward or do a complete reset of the day back to noon.  

The two areas where this game shines is the overall atmosphere of the mansion and the plot of the story once you get near the end.  Discovering different floors and rooms of the mansion stayed engaging for me because they all had a different feel and they looked cool.  Once you beat the game some may want to go back and get all of the collectibles and it doesn't feel monotonous because of the new areas you discover, different scenes with the guests that you may encounter and unlocking the collectibles gives you more background and lore on the mansion.   I can't say much on the ending without spoilers but I'll just say it was quite a twist and it was a clever story.  The music was quality as well and really helped make the scene in some parts of the game or make a different area feel more unique. 

The animation on opening doors can feel a little clunky at times but that is a very minor problem.  I had no crashes or bugs.  Also, the game minimizes and opens back up very fluidly which is nice.


The Sexy Brutale is good but I wouldn't say it is amazing.  It is worth playing if you have it.   If you don't own it I'd probably try to get it cheaper than $20 when you can.   It is relaxing and keeps you interested while having a memorable ending.

185432824.review: Five hours made me feel more than any 80 hour game

185324801.review:
As a point and click game with a focus on timing puzzles, this delivered a fun experience. The puzzles are on the light side, which I think works well--I was just as focused on skulking around and piecing together the story. 

Certain elements of the game felt brilliant. In particular, the limited field of vision from spying creates some *really* well-framed scenes, in a way that brings narrative, gameplay, and art together nicely.

Not everything felt like it worked, especially tonally. The cartoony character designs and goofy humor rubbed up against the horror and pathos, especially later in the game. 

Also . . .  I did heave a big sigh at the "voodoo princess" stuff. If you're going to make up a religion for your game, there's no reason to stick the name of a real religion on it. Or if you do, go big! Call her the Queen of Protestants.

185248352.review:
Esse é um exemplar de um ótimo jogo. Confesso que tive vontade de matar alguns dos convidados eu mesmo de tão estressantes que são alguns puzzle (pelo menos pra mim que não sou nenhum sherlock), mas a história e o humor presentes aqui são tão bons que você se esquece de todas as coisas ruins da sua vida (tipo quando você precisa salvar o casal de convidados e se imagina no cenário em que você vive uma vida feliz com sua namorada cega e ela não te deixa pra ficar com um outro cara aleatório que ela conheceu no instagram só porque você não "satisfaz" ela como ele, sendo que você se esforça bastante pra que ambos curtam seus momentos íntimos, tipo quando você permite que ela te vista com uma roupinha de boizinho e pede pra que você muja [sim, de mugir] enquanto ela grava dizendo que isso agrada ela [pensando bem, você provavelmente foi feito de otário e virou pauta no grupo do whatsapp das amigas dela])....

Ah e a trilha sonora do jogo é um jazzinho muito bom, pode comprar.

184297724.review:
A modern time capsule (2010') of a game, incorporating the old-school point and click mystery games with the 3D top down survival horror art style and story telling of the 2000.

The tone and story telling of the game is spot on. As you explore the eccentric party in the eerie art deco styled mansion, you'll feel the tension brought about by the powerlessness you feel on wanting to save everybody.

Game play wise, almost all the puzzle are well designed, but do take note that you should use the new powers given to you whenever it is possible and that you'll need to check the map time to time because it gives you the proper direction to solve some of the puzzle if you feel lost.

The frustrations about this game are that there are a couple of puzzles that has that old-school point and click logic, and some bugs involving some of the late game puzzles.

So if you like to play a puzzle game that rarely holds your hand with a fascination of old school art deco sounds and styles, Sexy Brutale is the game for you.

184177827.review: 主角获得了一个可以倒回时间的怀表，利用它在一个不断循环的周六的时间里，试图解开他所困在的这个豪宅里不断发生的杀人案，并改变惨死的宾客们的命运。流程较短谜题较简单(9小时完成，我还因为突发奇想而卡关了一阵)，但是整体做的很好，因为他场景里发生的事情确实是在发生的，你之前不理解的事情(比如说唐突的玻璃破碎声)，在之后你可以窥视到原因。而利用时空循环解谜的实感也很足。你有可能知道某人会死，但是却不知道他的死因，然后为了调查就需要跟踪他，之后不做干涉亲眼看着他死去，然后再倒转时间试图去挽救他的生命。有的时候甚至要从别人的尸体上获取道具来寻找能够解开谜题的线索(虽然有的时候你不需要这个线索猜都能猜到)。有的时候你苏醒的地点距离关键发生的地点太远了，你到了那个地方只能看到一片狼藉。于是你改变苏醒的地点，倒回时间，然后事先藏在一旁的房间里冷眼旁观，弄清楚犯人的把戏之后再倒回时间轻易解决。这确实有一种很新奇的体验，有的时候你会很匆忙地赶路，感觉真相距离自己就一步之遥。有的时候你又一点都不着急，仔细地思考和探索，哪怕需要你救的人已经死了很久了，你也不觉得慌张，因为时间尽在你的掌握之中，你随时可以再来一次。或许这就是轮回者的感觉吧

183686119.review:
It is an interesting experience, but it definitely has its flaws. 
Some of the mechanics feel janky, there's not much room for exploration until you've finished the "case", and some tasks are bit tedious. I got this game on sale so I personally did not mind the price then, and I have played for 9+ hours so time to money ratio is fine. There's also a hidden ending, although it was quite short. :p

Also fun to 100% achievements :)
